plot: One of Ned's professors seems to be haunted by a secret admirer, and a Ouija board predicts that somebody is going to die.

To have access to all the university libraries, including the exclusive Copeland Wing, Ned makes a bid at becoming an occult professor's newest T.A. but discovers that she's haunted. All wonder if it's the professor's eight-years-dead fiancé who's keeping his identity secret, but Ned's appraisal of a clue points out that they don't even have the gender of the ghost correct. Reliances on a Ouija board to communicate irritates Melinda but it works, along with an additional forecast of an impending death that she takes very seriously.—statmanjeff
